rangana shilpini shalani tharaka gana pasugiya dawaswala samajajala madhyayanwala pathurunu katha etharam honda eewa nowe.aya samajajala madhyayanta yomu karana chayarupawalata pawa noyekuth dena wiwidha prahara ella kala.ee dasun nishange miyayamath samagayi.

jathin athara samangiyata mahath haniyak gena dun this awurudu kuriru thrasthawadi uwadura hethuwen pidawata path shashri lankika janathawa ada samaye prathipala sathutin ha samadanayen bhukthi windimin sitina bawa penwa dun wirathunga mahatha, samaye paniwidaya lowata pawasimata shri lankawa tharam sudusu thawath ratak lowa wena nomathi bawath pawasiya.merata ahinsaka janaya eda thrasthawadaye gahata upekshawen windadara ganimata budu dahamen lada awabodhaya mana lesa iwahal wu bawa da pawasu janadhipathi lekamwaraya, sahajiwanaye saha mithrathwaye watinakama lowata kiya pame kadima madhyasthanayak bawata shri lankawa pathwa athayi da wadiduratath kiya sitiyeya.loka bauddha sangha sammelanaye sabhapathi layawu chung himiyan athulu des wides himiwarun wetha asirimath budu pilima wahanse namak saha 2600 weni shri sambuddhathwa jayanthiya nimiththen nikuth kala samaru kasiya bangin janadhipathithuma puja karaddi, siya aagamika katayuthu ithamath kramawathwa merata di pawathwima sandaha idahasara laba dimata dakwu sahayogayata kruthagnyathawaya pala karamin un wahansela wisin da janadhipathithuma wetha ema ratawalatama aawenika wu bauddha sanketha pirinamima da wisheshathwayak wini.pasugiyada lankawata wadama kala me maha sangharathnaya, nelum pokuna mahinda rajapaksha rangahale di wishwa samaya, sahajiwanaya ha samruddhiya patha wishesha aashirwadathmaka pirith sajjhayanayak pawathwu athara, mahanuwara dalada samindun abhiyasa di ha anuradhapura jaya shri maha bo samindun abhiyasa di da ewanima pujawan pawathwimata niyamithaya.me awasthawata adhyapana amathi bandula gunawardhana saha mudal ha krama sampadana niyojya amathi githanjana gunawardhana yana mahathwaru da ekwa sitiyaha..
